page.title: 09REDBOURN HIGH STREET CONT
page.content: {Redbourn High Street}is constantly changing.At present there are four empty shops,all of which closed down this year.One was a video hire shop, another was a betting shop and a third was an antique shop.There are also some areas of derelict land fronting the High Street. Since the{By_pass}has been opened in November 1984,the{High Street}is not so crowded and an effort has been made to bring back some of the old{ {character}of the village by putting old fashioned lamps in the street.
